channel.title: UEB Cluster Basic Tutorial on UEB cluster usage tutorial
channel.description: Recent content in UEB Cluster Basic Tutorial on UEB cluster usage tutorial

item.title: Practical Examples
item.description: We will explain in a simple way the following cases: Using pre-installed software. As an example, we will be performing some Quality Control steps for RNA-Seq raw data. Using Singularity containers. As an example we’ll use the pre-processed RNA-Seq data from the previous example, to perform a quasi-mapping quantification. Using conda to set up a deep learning landmark detection tool on clinical images, which will run on GPUs
